mono.usage: Use for DOIs, citations, and code snippets.

onboarding_grid.description: Pinterest-style masonry layout for interest selection. Images should be dominant.

dashboard_grid.description: Dense grid for analytics and recent activity.

search_results.description: Clean, readable list of paper cards with ample whitespace.

icons.usage: Use thin strokes (stroke-width={1.5}) for a refined look.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use the 'Modern Academic' theme: Clean, white/stone backgrounds, crisp typography.
Implement the 'Pinterest-style' onboarding using the Masonry layout defined above.
For the Paper Detail view, use a split layout: Left side for metadata/abstract, Right side for recommendations/graph.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds; use subtle noise or solid colors.
Use the provided image URLs for placeholders.
Prioritize readability: Use generous line-height and max-width for text blocks.
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Never use AI assistant Emoji characters.
